content: @Mara I was wondering (also sorry if you're not the right person to ping about this) if there's a spot we can add a Cargo item to track for the 2021 edition? We discussed today that we'd like to add resolver = "2" to the 2021 edition as part of the changes for Cargo, and I'd just want to make sure that's tracked like we're tracking the fix-changes as well (I can open a Cargo issue for this too if that would help)
@Alex Crichton yeah just add it to the hackmd file for now: https://hackmd.io/3eG6OZWHRbSMxoRxzwNhGQ?view
the other cargo item is near the bottom of that document
we'll structure it all later, put it all in categories, make sure everything has a person assigned and everything has an tracking issue etc.
there's also #edition for edition changes by the way, since many changes relate to multiple teams

the cargo fix --edition item is a bit different than the others, because it doesn't require an rfc or something. it's just something that needs to be done. the others probably require some more discussion and approval/fcp.
I think fixing cargo fix --edition is mostly just gonna be a glorified change to our test suite

@Alex Crichton are there any other cargo changes for 2021 (whether already decided or just as a vague idea, or anything in between)? would be good if this list would be somewhat complete by the end of february
Yeah we discussed that a bit today, but resolver = "2" changes was the only major thing we thought of
everything else planned will roll out as usual
@Alex Crichton okay! is that already decided on, or does that need to go through some rfc/fcp/something?
@Mara oh oops sorry missed this, I think it's already decided on, we just need to get the work done
the edition-rollout work that is, the feature itself is already implemented
